tern
  • Reference

Plotting data generated from chgfbl_data into change from baseline mean plot using ggplot2 and gridExtra

Plotting data generated from chgfbl_data into change from baseline mean plot using ggplot2 and gridExtra

chgfbl_plot(data, ytype = "CHG", errbar = "SE", ref_line = NULL,
  yrange = NULL, fontsize = 16, n_rotate = TRUE)

Arguments

data

data generated by chgfbl_data function
ytype

type of value to plot for y-axis, possible values can be "AVAL", "CHG" or "PCHG"
errbar

type of error bar to draw, possible values can be "SE", "SD", "95CI"
ref_line

horizontal reference lines, must be either NULL (default), a single number or a numeric vector
yrange

Range of y-axis to display in plot. If empty (default), range automatically controlled by ggplot2. Or must be a numeric vector of length of 2, with the first number smaller than second number.
fontsize

Font size of text to be displayed on the plot
n_rotate

logical value, FALSE is default, if TRUE text in the frequency table is rotated 90 degrees counterclockwise.

Examples


library(tern)
library(random.cdisc.data)

ASL <- radam("ASL")

ANL <- merge(ASL, radam("AQS", ADSL = ASL)) %>%
   filter(PARAMCD == "FATIGI")
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> Error in filter(., PARAMCD == "FATIGI"): object 'PARAMCD' not found

df <- chgfbl_data(data = ANL)
#> Error in chgfbl_data(data = ANL): object 'ANL' not found
chgfbl_plot(data = df, ytype = "CHG", errbar = "SE", ref_line = c(2, -2), fontsize = 14)
#> Error in data$mean: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable
